title: *Sun-Soaked 2-Bedroom Apartment w/Private Balcony* 411 4C
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We are the exclusive brokers for this building', '*BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION IN PRIME WILLIAMSBURG* / Lots of Unique Layouts are Available - 1, 2, and 3 Bedroom Apartments / Some with Private Roofdecks, Terraces, and Balconies /', '*Sun-Soaked 2-Bedroom Apartment w/Private Balcony*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '$5,400 Gross + 1 month free for asap move-in ($4,950 Net)', '*The Apartment Features:*', '2 Queen-Size Bedrooms / One of the Bedrooms Has a *Private Balcony* / Bathrooms with a Deep Soaking Tub / Spacious Living Space that Can Accommodate a Full Set of Entertainment Furniture & a small Dining Table / AC Unit in Each Room / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows / Great Direct Natural Light All Throughout the Apartment / Open Concept Kitchen with Brand New Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Built-in Microwave / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Lounge / Laundry Room / Furnished Roofdeck / Elevator /', 'A Step Away from the L & G Trains at Lorimer-Metropolitan Station /', 'Enjoy the Best Things that Williamsburg Has to Offer just Around the Corner: McCarren Park, East River Ferry, East River Park, Domino Park, Lots of Restaurants, Bars, Organic Supermarkets, Designer Shops, and So Much More...!', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $216,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
